item.title: 印度顶级基金经理在大选后都买了些什么？
item.description: 印度的顶级基金经理管理着近 1200 亿美元的股票资产，他们现在更青睐基本面强劲的大公司股票，因为本周的大选失利削弱了过去估值过高的赢家的吸引力。【原文：India’s top money managers, overseeing nearly $120 billion of equity assets, are now favoring shares of large firms with strong fundamentals as this week’s election upset dims the appeal of past winners with sky-high valuations.】

item.title: 香港计划于 9 月开始在台风期间进行交易
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，香港计划最快在 9 月份停止在恶劣天气期间关闭股市，允许在这种情况下像其他发达经济体一样进行交易。【原文：Hong Kong plans to stop shutting the stock market during severe weather as soon as September to allow trading in such conditions like in other advanced economies, according to people familiar of the matter.】

item.title: 摩根大通指数日期临近，印度储备创历史新高
item.description: 上周，印度的外汇储备增至 6,515 亿美元，创历史新高，因为在印度债券被纳入摩根大通银行（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：India’s foreign exchange reserves increased to a record high of $651.5 billion last week, as foreigners pile into its bonds ahead of their inclusion into JPMorgan Chase & Co. flagship emerging market debt index.】

item.title: 住宅建筑商 Bellway 发现英国住房市场出现复苏迹象
item.description: 贝尔威公司（Bellway Plc）表示，在销售量上升之后，有理由对英国住房市场持乐观态度。【原文：Bellway Plc says it sees reason for optimism in Britain’s housing market after an uplift in sales.】

item.title: 德国央行认为德国经济未来几年将保持良好势头
item.description: 德国联邦银行周五公布的最新预测显示，预计德国经济将在2024年缓慢获得增长动力，并在未来几年实现更强劲的增长。【原文：The Bundesbank expects the German economy to slowly gain momentum in 2024 followed by stronger growth in the years ahead, according to fresh forecasts published Friday.】

item.title: 交易员认为消费者乐观情绪在投票中得以延续
item.description: 策略师们表示，7 月 4 日英国大选之后，政治局势趋于平静，经济持续复苏，这些都将使消费者信心和零售业保持良好发展势头。【原文：The prospect of quieter politics and a continued economic recovery after the UK’s election on July 4 should keep consumer confidence and the retail sector on track, strategists say.】

item.title: 哈利法克斯（Halifax）称，英国 5 月房价下跌，延续停滞状态
item.description: 英国最大的抵押贷款机构之一表示，由于购房者面临着 16 年来最高利率对承受能力的限制，5 月份英国住房市场继续停滞不前。【原文：The UK housing market extended its stagnation in May as buyers faced constraints on affordability from the highest interest rates in 16 years, one of the nation’s biggest mortgage lenders said.】

item.title: 德国工业生产再次下滑，本季度开局不利
item.description: 德国 4 月份的工业产值出人意料地连续第二个月下降，表明欧洲最大经济体本季度的开局疲软。【原文：German industrial output unexpectedly fell for a second straight month in April, signaling a weak start to the quarter in Europe’s largest economy.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数有望创下一个月来最长涨势
item.description: 5 月 8 日（星期三），英国伦敦金融城英格兰银行（BOE）附近，上班族穿过一个十字路口。摄影师：Hollie Adams/Bloomberg【原文：Commuters cross a junction near the Bank of England (BOE) in the City of London, UK, on Wednesday, May 8. Photographer: Hollie Adams/Bloomberg】

item.title: 欧洲央行卡扎克称进一步降息需 "循序渐进
item.description: 理事会成员马丁斯-卡扎克认为，欧洲央行未来的任何降息行动都必须 "循序渐进"。【原文：Any future interest-rate reductions by the European Central Bank need to be “gradual,” according to Governing Council member Martins Kazaks.】

item.title: 中国对最大共同基金进行大规模审计审查
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，中国审计署正在对中国最大的共同基金进行全面的现场检查，这标志着中国审计署对该行业进行了最彻底的检查。【原文：China’s audit office is conducting comprehensive on-site inspections of the country’s biggest mutual funds, marking one of its most thorough examinations against the industry, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事欧洲
item.description:
及时了解市场监测情况

Get up to speed with what the markets are monitoring

】

item.title: 拉加德创造了历史。现在，欧盟选民也可能创造历史
item.description:
欧洲央行打破了美联储 25 年来的先例。下一个：欧洲议会选举可能向强硬右翼摇摆

The ECB broke 25 years of precedent with the Fed. Next up: European Parliament elections could swing to the hard right

】

item.title: 等待莫迪新政府上台，印度央行维持利率不变
item.description: 印度央行一如预期维持基准利率不变，在大选结果出人意料之后政策不确定的情况下继续关注通货膨胀。【原文：India’s central bank left its benchmark interest rate unchanged, as expected, keeping its focus on inflation amid policy uncertainty following an unexpected election result.】

item.title: 液化天然气在欧洲既是救星也是诅咒
item.description:
非洲大陆尚未摆脱能源危机。【原文：

The continent hasn’t emerged from its energy crisis yet.

】

item.title: 将资金投入 "脆弱 "欧洲的理由
item.description:
在本周的Merryn Talks Money节目中，基金经理丹尼尔-阿维加德（Daniel Avigad）解释了为什么非洲大陆的投资时机已经成熟。【原文：

On this week’s Merryn Talks Money, fund manager Daniel Avigad explains why the continent may be ripe for investment.

】

item.title: 可转债热潮有助于降低中国科技股的波动性
item.description: 中国科技公司急于发行可转换债券，使一些套利基金重新开始了有利可图的交易，此举也将降低这些公司股票的波动性。【原文：A rush by Chinese tech companies into convertible bond offerings is reviving a profitable trade for some arbitrage funds, a move that would also reduce volatility of their shares.】

item.title: 外国人抢购印度债券，摆脱莫迪选情挫折的影响
item.description: 印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）在大选中以微弱优势获胜后，全球投资者摆脱了对政策连续性的担忧，在印度加入全球主要债券指数之前抢购印度国债。【原文：Global investors lapped up Indian government debt ahead of the country’s entry into a major global bond index, shrugging off concerns about policy continuity after Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s slim election win.】

item.title: 印度市场热点：精明的散户投资者和大盘股卷土重来
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您提供可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件的每日摘要。【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a daily digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets.】

item.title: 欧盟新规将削弱私人信贷的隐私价值
item.description: 由于监管机构担心私人信贷市场的快速发展会威胁到金融体系，欧盟正在推动提高蓬勃发展的私人信贷市场的透明度。【原文：The European Union is pushing to bring more transparency to the booming private credit market as regulators worry its rapid growth could threaten the financial system.】

item.title: 中国对欧投资萎缩，大部分流向电动汽车行业
item.description: 去年，中国企业对欧洲的投资降至十多年来的最低点，大部分新资金投向了电动汽车和相关产业。【原文：Investment by Chinese firms into Europe fell to the lowest in more than a decade last year, with most of the new money going into electric vehicles and related industries.】

item.title: 三菱和三井住友银行将剥离 85 亿美元丰田股份
item.description: 知情人士透露，三菱日联金融集团公司和三井住友金融集团公司将开始剥离丰田汽车公司价值 1.32 万亿日元（85 亿美元）的战略股权，这是日本大企业开始认真解除其庞大的交叉持股网络的最强烈信号。【原文：Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group Inc. and Sumitomo Mitsui Financial Group Inc. will start divesting ¥1.32 trillion ($8.5 billion) worth of strategic shareholdings in Toyota Motor Corp., people with knowledge of the matter said, the strongest sign yet that Japan’s big businesses are getting serious about unwinding their vast network of cross-held shares.】

item.title: 中国 5 月伊朗石油进口量因利润率提高而大幅增长
item.description: 在炼油利润回升后，中国 5 月份的伊朗原油进口量飙升至七个月来的最高水平。【原文：China’s imports of Iranian crude in May surged to the highest level in seven months after a recovery in refining margins.】

item.title: 日经新闻》称 MUFG 单位可能因共享客户数据而受罚
item.description: 据《日经新闻》报道，三菱日联金融集团（Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group Inc.【原文：Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group Inc. units are facing potential penalties for sharing non-public information on client companies without their permission, the Nikkei newspaper reported.】

item.title: 印度央行利率决议前印度股市期货保持稳定
item.description: 印度股票期货周五持稳，投资者在等待印度央行自总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）在大选中以微弱劣势获胜引发对潜在财政民粹主义的担忧以来做出的首个货币政策决定。【原文：India’s stock futures were steady on Friday as investors awaited the central bank’s first monetary policy decision since a weak election win for Prime Minister Narendra Modi spurred some concern over potential fiscal populism.】

item.title: 中国人民银行的债券交易鼓声让市场对如何交易争论不休
item.description: 越来越多的人猜测中国人民银行将通过购买和出售政府债券来增加其政策工具箱，市场观察家们正在讨论这在实践中可能会如何发挥作用。【原文：Growing speculation the People’s Bank of China will add to its policy toolbox by buying and selling government bonds has market watchers debating how that’s likely to work in practice.】

item.title: 香港房地产销售下滑，反弹昙花一现
item.description: 香港房地产市场在政府减税政策推动短暂反弹仅三个月后再次下跌。【原文：Hong Kong’s property market is falling again, just three months after government tax breaks propelled a brief rally.】

item.title: 出售阿美石油公司将为沙特阿拉伯筹集至少 112 亿美元资金
item.description: 沙特阿美石油公司（Saudi Aramco）的大型股票发行将筹集至少 112 亿美元的资金，这是三年来全球最大的此类交易，将有助于为政府推动王国经济转型提供数亿美元的资金。【原文：Saudi Aramco’s mega stock offering is set to raise at least $11.2 billion, the biggest such deal globally in three years that will help fund the government’s multitrillion-dollar push to transform the kingdom’s economy.】

item.title: 加纳债券持有人被要求承担更多损失以与英国和中国竞争
item.description: 社会正义组织表示，加纳的欧元债券持有者需要承担更多损失，因为该国正在努力重组债务，以配合英国和中国等国所接受的付款削减。【原文：Ghana’s eurobond holders need to take more losses as the nation works to restructure debt to match payment cuts accepted by countries such as the UK and China, social-justice organizations said.】

item.title: 日本可能出售国债为创纪录的日元干预提供资金
item.description: 5 月份，日本持有的外国证券大幅下降，这表明日本政府可能通过出售国债和其他外国证券为其近期创纪录的货币市场干预行动提供了大部分资金，并且仍有充足的火力再次介入市场。【原文：Japan’s holdings of foreign securities dropped sharply in May, indicating that the government likely financed most of its recent record currency market intervention by selling Treasuries and other foreign securities and still has ample firepower to step into markets again.】
